logic_notes: ∀x. Cat x → Mammal x; Cat garfield ⊢ Mammal garfield
statement: Lemma entailment : (forall x:Ind, Cat x -> Mammal x) -> Cat garfield -> Mammal garfield.
baseline_proof: Proof. intros H1 H2. apply H1. exact H2. Qed.

logic_notes: ¬∃x. Cat x ∧ Reptile x; Cat garfield ⊢ ¬Reptile garfield (encoded as Cat x → ¬Reptile x)
statement: Lemma entailment : (forall x:Ind, Cat x -> ~ Reptile x) -> Cat garfield -> ~ Reptile garfield.
baseline_proof: Proof. intros Hc Hcat Hrep. apply (Hc garfield); assumption. Qed.
